H0.text: who brought the idea of castles to england. Viking Settlers

H1.text: who brought the idea of castles to england. Roman Legions

H2.text: who brought the idea of castles to england. Anglo-Saxon Kings

H3.text: who brought the idea of castles to england. Norman invaders

A4.text: To put down and prevent further rebellions the Normans constructed castles and fortifications in unprecedented numbers, initially mostly on the motte-and-bailey pattern.

A5.text: To control his new kingdom, William granted lands to his followers and built castles commanding military strong points throughout the land.
